title: Indian External Affairs Minister commends Dr. Harsha de Silva for his commitment to 1990 Suwaseriya
body_lines: Indian External Affairs Minister Dr. S. Jaishankar met with Dr. Harsha de Silva, founder of 1990 Suwaseriya, yesterday at the 1990 Headquarters in Rajagiriya.
Dr. Jaishankar reiterated his continued support to Sri Lanka and commended Dr. Harsha de Silva for his commitment to 1990 Suwaseriya.
State Minister Sudarshani Fernandopulle and a group of officials including 1990 Suwaseriya Chairman Dumindra Ratnayake were also present at the occasion.
